|  [targetGLSL](./shader-ast-glsl.targetglsl.md) | GLSL code gen, targets GLSL ES 3.00 (WebGL2) by default.<!-- -->Use options object to configure shader type and GLSL version: <code>100</code> for WebGL, 300 for WebGL2. Currently, the only differences in terms of code generation, not correctness, are:<!-- -->- attribute, varying, uniform declarations - texture lookup function naming<!-- -->Unsupported features in GLSL 100:<!-- -->- Fragment shader output vars |
